commands.name: az vmware datastore netapp-volume create
commands.summary: Create a new Microsoft.NetApp provided NetApp volume in a private cloud cluster.
commands.syntax:
az vmware datastore netapp-volume create --cluster
                                         --datastore-name
                                         --net-app-volume
                                         --private-cloud
                                         --resource-group
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
